title: Can state board students crack VITEEE? - Quora
tags: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination (VITEEE)

response.answer_text: Yes sure they can , there is not a single point that keep them void from cracking viteee. It is a very easy exam as they ask basic level questions even without negative marking. The only area where you are in disadvantage is that they ask 5 english questions based on cbse textbooks flamingo and vista.

VITEEE is one of the easiest engineering entrance exam which you can clear easily. Check the syllabus and pattern for VITEEE exams and find the areas in which you are weak and pay more attention to these topics. Try to remember all the formulas of 11th and 12th 60% questions will be only from formulas. Read NCERT Book line by line and solve all intext questions and practice 2–3 times atlest. Keep Smiling 😊

Yes do you have confident on you ,thenyou will crack not only VITEEE, BITSAT,JEE MAIN,IITJEE. Be positive,think that I can do every thing . but don’t think I can’t do any think. VITEEE is an easy exam.we can crack it.
Why not man..I am from state board and cracked VITEEE with good rank. You just need to prepare the NCERT basic books then practice AIEEE questions. Good luck..
